pages.text: The furnaces you used back in the day won't reach a high enough temperature to melt metals or even make bricks, you know what bricks are right?$(br2)*mumbles to self* Â§ooh I really hoped we didn't pick up a total nitwit.

The good news is that you should be able to make a weaker variant of the more modern brick, you just need to grab some $(l:sim_1/resources/0_surface_level#wet_clay)Wet clay$() and dry it using a drying rack.
The final product is a dried brick that doesn't look like much to the world... But it has it's uses

As you can see there is a lot of things down the line that uses dried bricks.$(br2)Luckily you can automate the $(l:sim_1/1_drying#drying_rack)Drying Rack$() once you lay your hands on better automation tools.
